title: Drawing, 1815–50
medium: Pen and ink, brush and gray wash on heavy off-white paper
inscribed: Verso: Inscribed in graphite across sheet: P. 12 / Lower right / Leave paper.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Pair of scissors with handles formed by half-figures of women with rinceaux as legs.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, 1815–50.
1815–50. Pen and ink, brush and gray wash on heavy off-white paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-5716.
